merged_caption: The video is a full shot, with the camera positioned at a high angle, looking down at a light brown, textured piece of paper resting on a dark brown wooden surface. The paper occupies the majority of the frame in the middle ground, with the wooden surface visible at the frame's edges in the background. The camera maintains a deep focus, keeping the entire paper sharp. At the top center of the paper, the word "Kafala" is printed in black, bold, sans-serif font. Below this, in the top center area of the paper, a businessman icon in a suit and tie is positioned. A worker icon wearing a hard hat and overalls is located in the center of the paper. A dotted line with a chain link pattern connects the businessman icon above to the worker icon. To the right of this chain, near the top right relative to the worker, a black rectangular icon resembling a credit card is labeled "VISA" in white capital letters. Initially, a document icon with a small, indistinct image appears to the left of the worker. Then, a barred window icon appears to the bottom left of the worker. As the video progresses, a clock icon emerges to the right of the worker, with a passport icon below it at the bottom right, featuring a globe symbol on its cover. A clenched fist icon with zig-zag lines emanating from it materializes directly below the worker. Finally, an icon depicting a whip and a building with columns appears to the left of the businessman icon, near the top left relative to the worker. An overlay number "[24]" is visible in the bottom left of the frame. The camera initially focuses on the paper, then slowly and smoothly rises, simultaneously rolling clockwise around the paper to reveal more of its surface, enhancing the dynamic storytelling of the video.

input_captions.Camera: The camera is positioned at a high angle, looking down at a piece of paper on a table. It maintains a deep focus, keeping the entire paper sharp. The camera initially focuses on the paper, then slowly and smoothly rises, simultaneously rolling clockwise around the paper to reveal more of its surface.
input_captions.Subject: The video displays a diagram on light brown, textured paper, titled "Kafala" in a black, bold, sans-serif font at the top. Central to the diagram is a black silhouette icon of a worker wearing a hard hat and overalls, facing forward. Above the worker, a black silhouette icon of a person in a suit and tie is connected to the worker by a dotted line featuring a chain link pattern. To the right of this chain, a black rectangular icon resembling a credit card is labeled "VISA" in white capital letters. The worker icon is further connected by simple black dotted lines to several other black icons. To the worker's left is an icon of a rectangular document with a small, indistinct image. Below and to the left of the worker is an icon resembling a barred window. Below the worker is an icon of a clenched fist with zig-zag lines emanating from it. To the worker's right is an icon of a circular clock face with hands. Below the clock icon is an icon of a passport with a globe symbol on its cover. An additional icon appears to the left of the worker, depicting a whip and a building with columns. An overlay number is visible in the bottom left of the frame.
input_captions.Motion: The video presents an animated sequence on a light brown, textured paper backdrop, framed by a dark brown wooden surface. At the top center, the word "Kafala" is prominently displayed. Below, a businessman icon is linked by a dotted chain to a worker icon in the center. A "VISA" card icon is positioned near the top right of the worker. Initially, a document icon appears to the left of the worker, followed by a barred window icon at the bottom left. As the animation progresses, a clock icon emerges to the right of the worker, with a passport icon below it at the bottom right. A clenched fist icon then materializes directly beneath the worker. Finally, an icon of a whip and a building appears to the left of the businessman, near the top left relative to the worker, enhancing the dynamic storytelling of the video.
input_captions.Scene: The video shows a light brown, textured piece of paper resting on a dark brown wooden surface. At the top center of the paper, the word "Kafala" is printed in black. Below this, a diagram in black ink illustrates a central figure of a worker in a hard hat. A dotted line with a chain link connects this worker to an icon of a businessman in a suit positioned above. Another dotted line connects the worker to a "VISA" card icon to the right. As the video progresses, additional black icons appear around the central worker, connected by dotted lines: a document icon to the left, a barred window icon below and to the left, a clenched fist icon directly below, a passport icon below and to the right, and a clock icon to the right. Later, an icon depicting a whip and a building appears to the left of the businessman icon. An overlay of "[24]" is located in the bottom left corner of the video.
input_captions.Spatial: The video is a full shot, with the camera positioned above the subject. The light brown, textured paper occupies the majority of the frame in the middle ground, set against a dark brown wooden surface visible at the frame's edges in the background. At the top center of the paper, the word "Kafala" is printed. Below this, in the top center area of the paper, a businessman icon is positioned. A worker icon is located in the center of the paper. A dotted line with a chain link connects the businessman icon above to the worker icon. To the right of this chain, near the top right relative to the worker, a "VISA" card icon is present. Initially, a document icon is to the left of the worker. Then, a barred window icon appears to the bottom left of the worker. As the video progresses, a clock icon appears to the right of the worker. Subsequently, a passport icon appears below the clock, positioned to the bottom right of the worker. Then, a clenched fist icon materializes directly below the worker. Finally, an icon depicting a whip and a building appears to the left of the businessman icon, near the top left relative to the worker. All icons and text are in the middle ground on the paper. An overlay number is present in the bottom left of the frame.

prompt:
Please merge the following five captions into a single, comprehensive caption that describes the video completely without any redundancy.

Caption Types:
1. Subject: Describes the subjects/people in the video
2. Scene: Describes the scene composition and environment
3. Motion: Describes the movement and dynamics of subjects
4. Spatial: Describes the spatial relationships and framing
5. Camera: Describes camera movements and framing choices

Input Captions:
{captions}

Instructions:
1. Use the SPATIAL caption as your BASE structure - it provides the core visual description and framing
2. Merge MOTION and CAMERA captions into the spatial description to create a temporally coherent narrative that describes how things change over time
3. Add information from SUBJECT and SCENE captions ONLY if they contain unique details not already covered in the Spatial caption
4. Eliminate ALL redundant information - if the same detail appears in multiple captions, mention it only ONCE
5. Preserve the EXACT wording from the original captions - do NOT paraphrase
6. When describing temporal changes, integrate motion and camera movements in chronological order to show how the scene evolves
7. CRITICAL: Every unique detail from all five captions must appear in the final merged caption - nothing should be omitted
8. Do NOT add any information not present in the original captions
9. Return only the merged caption without any additional text or formatting

Goal: A single, temporally coherent caption based on the Spatial description, with Motion and Camera information merged chronologically, and Subject/Scene details added only when they provide new information. Keep as many details as possible but limit to at most 320 words.
